DataElement.preferredName: School Or Occupation Attempt Unable to Do Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not you were unable to attempt school or work.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: School Or Occupation Attempt Unable to Do
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An educational institution._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The principal activity that a person does to earn money._An activity intended to do or accomplish something.  Routinely used as in "number of tries to complete a procedure"._A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An educational institution.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The principal activity that a person does to earn money.:An activity intended to do or accomplish something.  Routinely used as in "number of tries to complete a procedure".

Concepts.definition: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The principal activity that a person does to earn money.

Property.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
